thread.title: Ernie
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Ernie

author: Ernie
title: Ernie
text: I used SelectQuote: for life insurance a few years back. When I needed to insure my new home I figured I would just see what they could do for me. Totally impressed by how easy it was and the rate i recieved. Kudos to Brittney Richardson in Kansas. She did a great job and I would recommend her and SelectQuote: to anyone. Thanks!
